mapper.select: select * from product where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') order by no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{pageEnd}
select count(*) from product where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into product( title, content, writer, price, thumbnail, like_count, dislike_count, regist_date, update_date, delete_yn) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{price}, #{thumbnail}, #{like_count}, #{dislike_count}, #{regist_date}, #{update_date}, #{delete_yn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, price = #{price}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, like_count = #{like_count}, dislike_count = #{dislike_count}, regist_date = #{regist_date}, update_date = #{update_date}, delete_yn = #{delete_yn} WHERE no = #{no}
